Frequently Asked Questions

Everything you need to know about becoming a vendor

What are the requirements to become a vendor?

We require all vendors to have a registered business (sole proprietorship, LLC, or corporation), quality products that meet our standards, and the ability to fulfill orders promptly. All products must comply with applicable laws and regulations.

How long does the approval process take?

Our standard review process takes 3-5 business days after receiving your complete application. During peak periods, it may take up to 7 business days. We'll notify you via email once your application has been reviewed.

Who handles customer service for my products?

Our team handles initial customer inquiries and order processing. For product-specific questions, shipping updates, or returns, we'll connect customers directly with you through our vendor portal messaging system.

How and when do I get paid?

Payments are processed according to your selected plan (monthly, bi-weekly, or weekly). We transfer funds directly to your account after deducting our commission. Detailed sales reports are available in your vendor dashboard.

What happens if I have issues with my account?

Our dedicated vendor support team is available to assist with any account or technical issues. Response times vary by your plan level, with priority support responding within 2 business hours for Professional and Enterprise plans.

Have more questions? Contact our vendor team for personalized assistance.
